thread.title: Grand Opening Of Boscov's In Meriden

author: courant.com
title: Grand Opening Of Boscov's In Meriden
text:
Caption Grand Opening Of Boscov's In Meriden Mark Mirko / Hartford Courant Al Boscov, chairman, chief executive officer and son of Boscov's Department Stores founder Solomon Boscov, kisses the hand of shopper and self-proclaimed "Joisey Girl" during today's grand opening of Boscov's in Meriden.
Al Boscov, chairman, chief executive officer and son of Boscov's Department Stores founder Solomon Boscov, kisses the hand of shopper and self-proclaimed "Joisey Girl" during today's grand opening of Boscov's in Meriden.
(Mark Mirko / Hartford Courant) Grand Opening Of Boscov's In Meriden Mark Mirko / Hartford Courant Dee Matos (L) shares a laugh with her boyfriend Dan Gacek while the two shopped for dining room tables today during the grand opening at Boscov's.
Dee Matos (L) shares a laugh with her boyfriend Dan Gacek while the two shopped for dining room tables today during the grand opening at Boscov's.
(Mark Mirko / Hartford Courant) See more galleries Boscovâ€™s, the smaller, privately owned chain known for community outreach, held its grand opening in Meriden Thursday.
